citation.title: Vacancy- and adatom-induced √3×√3 reconstructions of the Si(111) surface
citation.abstract: Statics calculations of the surface energy and stress of the H3,T4, and vacancy structures for the Si(111)-√3 × √3 surface were performed using empirical interatomic potentials. For high coverages, vacancy formation on the Si(111) is strongly endothermic in agreement with tight-binding calculations and quantum-chemical calculations on clusters. For the √3 × √3 structure, the vacancy formation energy is 1.5 eV/vacancy. Thus, the vacancy model for the √3 × √3 surface, based on low-energy electron-diffraction data, is not energetically favorable.
